conclusion: Analyze the problem: wire bent into V-shape, uniform magnetic field, find total Ampere force
Each arm of the V has length l
Apply Lorentz force formula: F = I L x B
Force magnitude on each arm is F_arm = IlB
Direction of force is perpendicular to current and magnetic field
Forces on arms are at 60Â° to each other
Total force magnitude is F_total = sqrt(3)IlB
